## Hours of Operation

Tuesday – Saturday |  10 a.m. – 5 p.m. _Burial Ground closes and programming ends at 4 p.m. The main site is open until 5 p.m._ Animal feedings Wed., Fri., and Sat. at 10:30 a.m.  
---|---  
Sunday |  1 – 5 p.m. Self-guided tours  
Monday | Closed  
  
  * _Limited handicapped accessibility.__Pets not permitted._
  * _Closed on New Year’s Day, Easter, Juneteenth, Independence Day, Veterans Day, Thanksgiving (and the day following Thanksgiving), Christmas Eve, and Christmas Day._
  * _Site closed until 3:00 p.m. for selected special events, including Christmas Candlelight Tours. Subject to change._

## A Day At Historic Brattonsville

## General Admission

Adults (18 – 59) | $12  
---|---  
Seniors (60+) | $10  
Youth (4 – 17) | $8  
Members and Children 3 & younger | Free  
  
_* Pre-booked group rates available.[See information below.](/plan-your-visit-hb/#groupinfo)_

## Ticket Sales

Online Ticket Sales Cutoff | 3 p.m.  
---|---  
Walk-up Ticket Sales Cutoff | 4 p.m.  
  
[Reserve Tickets Here](https://sales.chmuseums.org/calendar.aspx)

admission_text:
# Membership Information

CHM Member Benefits

Membership Levels

Helpful Membership Info

Member FAQs

Our museums provide ongoing creative, fun, and educational programming throughout the year to members, guests, and our community. As a member, your support of Culture & Heritage Museums preserves the natural and cultural histories of the Carolina Piedmont and inspires a lifetime of learning.

With one-of-a-kind exhibits, events, and programs you will want to visit our museums again and again! Become a member, and enjoy an entire year of exclusive benefits, including free general admission to our museum sites, program discounts, discounts at our museum stores, inclusion in the Southeastern Reciprocal Membership Program, and more!

_Each annual membership is valid for 12 months and begins on the day of purchase._

[JOIN NOW](https://sales.chmuseums.org/membership.aspx)

# CHM Member Benefits

As a member, you’ll receive these great benefits:

**• Free General Admission –** One year of free general admission to Main Street Children’s Museum, Museum of York County, and Historic Brattonsville, and complimentary or discounted admission to select programs and events at CHM.  
•**Discounts** – Member discounts on museum store purchases and select programs, seminars, events, and performances.  
• **Special Access –** Invitations to exclusive previews, openings, and events.  
• **Updates** – Email notifications of programs, events, seminars, and monthly activity calendar.  
__

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

Historic Brattonsville

Main Street Children’s Museum

McCelvey Center

Museum of York County

# Kulture City

Culture & Heritage Museums has partnered with [KultureCity®](https://www.kulturecity.org/) to enhance our ability to assist and accommodate guests with sensory needs. Our goal is to provide an inclusive experience for all guests during all events. We strive to raise awareness of the needs and challenges faced by individuals with sensory processing needs by supplying our staff with annual training and by offering our guests resources and accommodations below at our participating site locations.

Download the KultureCity® App to get your social story to help you further with your visit to Historic Brattonsville, Main Street Children’s Museum, and Museum of York County.  
• App Store: <http://bit.ly/KCiphone>  
• Google Play: <http://bit.ly/KCandroid>

[](https://www.kulturecity.org/)

# Museums for All

All Culture & Heritage Museum sites are a part of [Museums for All](https://museums4all.org/), an initiative of Institute of Museum and Library Services. The program allows for reduced admission rates for individuals receiving SNAP or EBT benefits. Those wishing to take advantage of the program would be eligible for reduced, walkup admission at all of our sites by showing their EBT/SNAP card at check-in. The reduced rate is valid for up to four individuals per party/card shown. Our reduced rate at all sites will be $3 per person.

[](https://museums4all...

## Welcome to CHM

**Culture & Heritage Museums** is a family of museums in York County, SC, which includes Historic Brattonsville, Main Street Children’s Museum, McCelvey Center, and Museum of York County.
